testCase.name: ADAPTER | Cache Client RESOURCE | get should call cacheManager.get with key
ADAPTER | Cache Client RESOURCE | get should return value from cacheManager.get
ADAPTER | Cache Client RESOURCE | set should call cacheManager.set with key and value
USE-CASE | attach-file-slack-message-history-by-channel SUCCESS FLOWS Should be attach file to slack channel
USE-CASE | attach-file-slack-message-history-by-channel FAILED FLOWS Should throw error for adapter fail and return bubbling exception message
DECORATOR | persistence-slack-api.decorator Should be call sendMessage method and must record the sent message
DECORATOR | persistence-slack-api.decorator Should be call getMessage
DECORATOR | persistence-slack-api.decorator Should be call attachFile
USE-CASE | send-slack-message-by-channels SUCCESS FLOWS Should be send a slack message by channels
USE-CASE | send-slack-message-by-channels SUCCESS FLOWS Should be skip message by cache register
USE-CASE | send-slack-message-by-channels FAILED FLOWS Should throw error for adapter fail and return bubbling exception message
USE-CASE | get-slack-message-history-by-channel SUCCESS FLOWS Should be return a slack message history
USE-CASE | get-slack-message-history-by-channel FAILED FLOWS Should throw error for adapter fail and return bubbling exception message
REPOSITORY | Message SUCCESS should be add document
REPOSITORY | Message SUCCESS should be skip add document by existing referenceId
REPOSITORY | Message FAILED should be return AddDocumentToDatabaseException exception
ADAPTER | Slack Api RESOURCE | getMessage Should be defined
ADAPTER | Slack Api RESOURCE | getMessage Should be get slack message
ADAPTER | Slack Api RESOURCE | getMessage Should be fail and throw GetMessageSlackException Exception
ADAPTER | Slack Api RESOURCE | getMessage Should be fail by ok value false and throw GetMessageSlackException Exception
ADAPTER | Slack Api RESOURCE | sendMessage Should be send slack messages
ADAPTER | Slack Api RESOURCE | sendMessage Should be fail and throw SendMessageSlackException Exception
ADAPTER | Slack Api RESOURCE | sendMessage Should be fail by ok value false and throw SendMessageSlackException Exception
ADAPTER | Slack Api RESOURCE | attachFilev Should be send slack messages
ADAPTER | Slack Api RESOURCE | attachFilev Should be fail and throw AttachFileSlackException Exception
ADAPTER | Slack Api RESOURCE | attachFilev Should be fail by ok value false and throw AttachFileSlackException Exception
ADAPTER | Logger Client Should log info
ADAPTER | Logger Client Should log warn
ADAPTER | Logger Client Should log error
CONTROLLERS | Integration Should be return slack message history
CONTROLLERS | Integration Should be send slack messages by channel
CONTROLLERS | Integration Should be attach file to slack
